Question: ThinLight Technologies Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ThinLight Technologies Corporation

LED Panels

- Thin, customizable design
- Optically clear laser engraved acrylic
- Utilizes some of the brightest LEDs available
- Offers uniform light distribution
- Lightweight construction
Summary_cn:

- 光学透明的激光雕刻亚克力
- 利用一些最亮的LED

- 轻便的构造
